book.title: Balaam and His Master and Other Sketches and Stories
book.description: 简介： What fantastic tricks are played by fate or circumstance! Here is a horrible war that shall redeem a nation, that shall restore civilization, that shall establish Christianity. Here is a university of slavery that shall lead the savage to citizenship...
